1 //
2 // Original author Kristoffer Larsen. Latest change date 01.05.2016
3 // qnode.cpp is responsible for all cross application communication within ROS.
4 //
5 // Created as part of the software solution for a Master's Thesis in Production Technology at NTNU Trondheim.
6 //

8 #include "../include/qt_filter_tester/qnode.hpp"
9 
10 namespace qt_filter_tester {
11 
12 QNode::QNode(int argc, char** argv ) :
13  init_argc(argc),
14  init_argv(argv)
15  {}
16 
17 QNode::~QNode() {
18  if(ros::isStarted()) {
19  ros::shutdown();
20  ros::waitForShutdown();
21  }
22  wait();
23 }
24 
25 bool QNode::init() {
26  ros::init(init_argc,init_argv,"qt_filter_tester");
27  if ( ! ros::master::check() ) {
28  return false;
29  }
30  ros::start();
31  ros::NodeHandle n;
32  start();
33  return true;
34 }
35 
36 bool QNode::init(const std::string &master_url, const std::string &host_url) {
37  std::map<std::string,std::string> remappings;
38  remappings["__master"] = master_url;
39  remappings["__hostname"] = host_url;
40  ros::init(remappings,"qt_filter_tester");
41  if ( ! ros::master::check() ) {
42  return false;
43  }
44  ros::start();
45  ros::NodeHandle n;
46  start();
47  return true;
48 }
49 
50 void QNode::run() {
51  ros::Rate loop_rate(1);
52  while ( ros::ok() ) {
53  ros::spinOnce();
54  loop_rate.sleep();
55  }
56  Q_EMIT rosShutdown();
57 }
58 }
qt_filter_tester::QNode::rosShutdown
void rosShutdown()
Signals the user interface to close upon a ros shutdown.
qt_filter_tester::QNode::run
void run()
Starts the main thread. At this point, the thread is driven by ROS communication events.
